questions.text: When faced with a difficult problem, how do you typically react?

options.text: I tackle it head-on and won't stop until it's solved
I take a step back and try to look at it from different angles
I try to find someone else to help me with it
I try to break it down into smaller, more manageable parts

questions.text: How do you typically handle criticism?

options.text: I take it as a challenge to improve myself
I try to understand where the criticism is coming from and learn from it
I try to avoid criticism as much as possible
I take it in stride and use it to motivate myself

questions.text: What is your approach to learning new things?

options.text: I jump right in and learn as I go
I like to research and gather information before I start
I prefer to learn from others
I learn best by doing and experimenting

questions.text: How do you typically handle unexpected changes or obstacles?

options.text: I adapt quickly and come up with a new plan
I take a step back and try to reassess the situation
I become stressed and overwhelmed
I try to find creative solutions to overcome the obstacle

questions.text: How do you typically approach decision-making?

options.text: I make decisions quickly and confidently
I like to weigh all the options and gather input from others
I avoid making decisions as much as possible
I make decisions based on my intuition and feelings

questions.text: What motivates you to work hard?

options.text: I am driven by my desire to achieve my goals
I am motivated by the challenge and opportunity for growth
I am motivated by the praise and recognition of others
I am motivated by the prospect of helping others

questions.text: What do you typically do in your free time?

options.text: I like to set personal goals and work towards them
I enjoy reading and learning new things
I enjoy spending time with friends and family
I enjoy engaging in creative activities like painting or writing

questions.text: How do you typically handle stressful situations?

options.text: I try to remain calm and focused
I try to find ways to alleviate the stress, like exercise or meditation
I become easily overwhelmed and struggle to cope
I try to find solutions to the cause of the stress

questions.text: How do you typically approach challenges that are outside of your comfort zone?

options.text: I see it as an opportunity to grow and push myself
I am cautious but willing to take calculated risks
I prefer to stick to what I know and avoid the challenge
I embrace the challenge and look for ways to learn and improve
